Production Co: Albachiara, Arte France Cinema, Networkmovie, StudioCanal
Synopsis: Wealthy but arrogant writer Jean Hervey (Pascal Greggory) comes home one day to find that his wife, Gabrielle (Isabelle Huppert), has left him for another man. Realizing her mistake, Gabrielle returns, and the pair begin a merciless analysis of their marriage as the relationship comes undone.
Title: Gabrielle
